body: Just out of curiosity, what exactly *is* going on? [The only other reference I see to this particular issue is another github project](https://github.com/lorentey/LKSecurity/blob/master/Bugs/CopyNormalizedSubjectContent%20crash/bugreport-11931740.txt); is this a regression in 10.8? (For what it's worth, I have 10.8-10.10 VMs to test potential issues with as well.)
